I bought this a replacement whilst my main phone was in for repair. 

The operating system eats up a significant amount of the onboard memory, so dont think youll be getting much more than WhatsApp (with very few messages) on it.

The chat software (text messaging system) is buggy, particularly if youre receiving messages from short number texts, in my circumstances authentication codes from Microsoft/social media accounts etc

The camera is near useless

The touch screen is low rent often meaning you end up clicking on adjacent buttons on an ill-designed operating system.

The phone is laggy. Opening basic webpages, tapping in commands to the operating system can be painfully slow.

On the upside its light and phone calls work once you get the operating system to connect the call, which is particularly difficult and laggy if you were say surfing the web at the time of receiving  the call.
